EmailTemplate.description: Email template for a notification sent to the CDE Group when a new Helix Design request for a Carport is created by a dealer.
EmailTemplate.name: New Helix Design Carport Request
EmailTemplate.subject: A New Carport Design Request has been Submitted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear CDE Team,
A new carport design request, {!Design__c.Name} ({!Design__c.Link}), was recently submitted. Please assign the appropriate technology system.
Thank you.
This is an automatically generated email. Please do not respond.
